post_text: April 15, 2015 at 9:58 PM#1its possible add 2 or more variables to another one? eg:setuservar $aa=1setuservar $bb=0setuservar $cc=3setuservar $vv=$"aa"; adduservar $vv=$"bb"; adduservar $vv=$"cc"-or-setuservar $vv=$"aa"$"bb"$"cc"my result  with adduservar is $vv=4.... not "103".... some idea?Thanks...ALe...
title: Add 2 user var to other
